ygData.subject: Re: Pottery?? The unknown art form, hehe
ygData.msgSnippet: I visited Highhold at level six on my first journey out of Western Antonica, and I am wondering the same thing, I got lucky and the huge orc that was killing
ygData.messageBody:
I visited Highhold at level six on my first journey out of Western Antonica, and

I am wondering the same thing, I got lucky and the huge orc that was killing me
started fighting the 10 townspeople or so. There are so many bodies in the Hold

that it is hard not to trip. I know that many are trying to get through and
hope they banked their belongings before the trip.

I just gave directions to a lv10 human to make the trip. He said that it was
still full of bodies but he had heeded my warnings and made it safely through,
also did the trip naked, which was wise. If people desire to goto Rivervale
from Qeynos I recommend Highhold, is a little easier. I personally take
Beholder, tis a scarier but shorter sprint. I am a lv 8 wiz and did Beholder,
of course I was half up a mountain face and avoinding even the cockroaches, but
I made it through. Highhold is interesting, but with orcs raiding into town it
is definatly not safe for any lv 8 characters. Not that the minotuars of
Beholder are any better for us.

Zakrul The Traveler
Companion
Wizard
Whereabouts unknown

> Please tell... What do you mean by this? It seems you are saying that
> Enchanters frequent HighPass? Beginning at level 8? Why in the world
> would
